title: Data Pools
subtitle: A data pool is like a container that can contain various files. These can be files (PDF, Word, etc.) or web pages, for example.
name: Name
openSub: When activated, your data pool is publicly available. Necessary for public agents.
selectText: Now add your data to the data pool.
websiteSub: Crawl all pages on your website.
dataSub: e.g.: PDF, CSV, JSON, Text, PowerPoint, Word, Excel
webSmallSub: Crawl a single page of your website.
qaSub: Explicit question-answer pairs to fine-tune your AI
question: Question
addDataText: Add Data to your Data Pool
selectDataOrDrop: Select Data or move it inside the Box
selectDataOrDropData: PDF, PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Text, Markdown,
urlText: The crawler attempts to find and extract text from all pages of a website within 45 seconds.
url2Text: Crawls all URLs from a sitemap.
